reviews.name: Camp Chef Yukon 60,000-BTU 2-Burner Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: We went camping at the Lake last weekend and this is hands down the best stove we've ever had. Set-up takes less than 5 minutes. It even came with Carry Bag that Walmart sells for $30.00 separately. We had 10 people with us and this stove was able to cook alot and fast.
reviews.title: Stove was Ready to Cook out of Box

reviews.name: Camp Chef Yukon 60,000-BTU 2-Burner Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: assembled easy out of the box. flame control is pretty impressive, it will really roar and get things boiling, and it will go down to a whisper of a flame and not go out. The grate is welded on, so cleaning will be a problem. this was a good purchase. I have a lot of outdoor stoves, ranging from backpacking tiny, to butane gas range, to turkey fryer style- this one has all the elements you are looking for in a compact yet large portable stove. I just wish i had bought this 5 or 6 years ago.
reviews.title: solid construction, good flame control

reviews.name: Camp Chef Yukon 60,000-BTU 2-Burner Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this item on site to store about 2 weeks after Thanksgiving so that I would be sure to get it for my husband's Christmas gift. It arrived at least 4 days before I expected it! My husband was thrilled with it! Thanks Wal-Mart!
reviews.title: 25 December 2011

reviews.name: Camp Chef Yukon 60,000-BTU 2-Burner Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: Well worth the money, works like a kitchen stove.
reviews.title: excellent value, well built

reviews.name: Camp Chef Yukon 60,000-BTU 2-Burner Camp Stove
reviews.reviewText: Quality appears very good. I do recommend the optional leg extenders and optional side shelves.
reviews.title: 15 July 2013
